title: The mirror of martyrs, or The life and death of that thrice valiant capitaine, and most godly martyre Sir Iohn Old-castle knight Lord Cobham
author: Weever, John, 1576-1632.
publisher: Printed by V[alentine] S[immes] for William Wood,
notes: Running title reads: The life and death of Sir Iohn Oldcastle knight.
Quires B, D, and F have vertical chainlines.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
